item.title: 🐍 davidkimai/Context-Engineering (1377 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: davidkimai

📝 Repository: davidkimai/Context-Engineering

📄 Descrizione: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A practical, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.

⭐ Stelle: 1377

🍴 Forks: 154

💻 Linguaggio: Python

📜 Licenza: MIT License

⏰ Creato il: 2025-06-29T00:16:36Z

item.title: 🐍 xid32/SoundMind (633 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: xid32

📝 Repository: xid32/SoundMind

📄 Descrizione: We introduce the Audio Logical Reasoning (ALR) dataset, consisting of 6,446 text-audio annotated samples specifically designed for complex reasoning tasks. Building on this resource, we propose SoundMind, a rule-based reinforcement learning (RL) algorithm tailored to endow audio language models (ALMs) with deep bimodal reasoning abilities.

⭐ Stelle: 633

🍴 Forks: 86

💻 Linguaggio: Python

🏷️ Topics: audio-language-model audio-reasoning dataset reinforcement-learning

📜 Licenza: MIT License
